snippet.title: New Trailer Video of 'MazM: The Phantom of the Opera'
snippet.description:
[Game Download Link]
Experience a breathtaking game between the honorable and the deplorable!
https://bit.ly/2R0oATF

[About New Official Trailer]
We are very happy to introduce new trailer video for 'MazM: The Phantom of the Opera’. It supports various languages for global MazMian who are waiting for the game to be translated. We hope you to enjoy it.

[Plan for new localization]
Recently, we could start to localize Russian, Spanish and Japanese for 'MazM: The Phantom of the Opera’. But it would be updated on April 2020, because it has just started. Sorry to keep you waiting so long.

[We are looking for localization partners]
We also know many people want to be supported their own languages. But honestly, our team don’t have enough budget to translate. So, it is hard to localize many languages quickly.

If there are translators who can help us among our fans, we’d like to ask them for help and proceed with translation.

If you know people who could be recommend or if you have interest yourself, please mail to storymazm@gmail.com. We are always open to meet new partnership.

We will post the update which explain details about translation.

Thanks a lot.
MazM

localized.title: New Trailer Video of 'MazM: The Phantom of the Opera'
localized.description:
[Game Download Link]
Experience a breathtaking game between the honorable and the deplorable!
https://bit.ly/2R0oATF

[About New Official Trailer]
We are very happy to introduce new trailer video for 'MazM: The Phantom of the Opera’. It supports various languages for global MazMian who are waiting for the game to be translated. We hope you to enjoy it.

[Plan for new localization]
Recently, we could start to localize Russian, Spanish and Japanese for 'MazM: The Phantom of the Opera’. But it would be updated on April 2020, because it has just started. Sorry to keep you waiting so long.

[We are looking for localization partners]
We also know many people want to be supported their own languages. But honestly, our team don’t have enough budget to translate. So, it is hard to localize many languages quickly.

If there are translators who can help us among our fans, we’d like to ask them for help and proceed with translation.

If you know people who could be recommend or if you have interest yourself, please mail to storymazm@gmail.com. We are always open to meet new partnership.

We will post the update which explain details about translation.

Thanks a lot.
MazM
